name: the magical adventures of donki doj doj
name_original: the magical adventures of donki doj doj
description:
A young wizard apprentice has been wrongfully imprisoned in a cottage by his douchy master. Only you can help him learn the magics he needs to get, not only sweet revenge, but also a buttload of lollipops!

Will you aid him in this fight against injustice and candy shortage? Give it a try! It's kinda fun.
